author: cbs8
title: CTV Presents Behind-the-Scenes Look at Fall's #1 New Series in ETALK PRESENTS: QUANTICO, Tomorrow
text:
CTV
– All-new episodes of QUANTICO air Sundays at 10 p.m. ET /PT on CTV and CTV GO –
To tweet this release: bmpr.ca/1G2GoUb
TORONTO , Oct. 9, 2015 /CNW/ - Feast on this! This Thanksgiving weekend, CTV's ETALK heads to the Montréal set of Canada's #1 new fall series QUANTICO for an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the new blockbuster drama. ETALK PRESENTS: QUANTICO premieres tomorrow, Saturday, Oct. 10 at 5:30 p.m. ET on CTV, and Sunday, Oct. 11 at 6:30 p.m. ET on CTV Two. The half-hour special dives right into the drama's conspiracy and brings viewers even closer to the action, as ETALK Reporter Liz Trinnear sits down with the cast on-set in Montreal , including series breakout lead and Bollywood star, Priyanka Chopra . Click here to view a sneak peek from ETALK PRESENTS: QUANTICO .
**Media Note – Download photography for QUANTICO at BellMediaPR.ca
In advance of Sunday night's all-new episode of QUANTICO ( Oct. 11 at 10 p.m. ET /PT on CTV and CTV GO), ETALK PRESENTS: QUANTICO introduces viewers to the series' stellar roster of recruits and agents, including new cast member Josh Hopkins (COUGAR TOWN), who also stars in the series as Deputy Director Liam O'Connor . The special gives viewers the inside scoop on stunts, training, the importance of secrets, and even the cast's take on the identity of the terrorist so central to the series' plot. Complete with an exclusive tour of the Montréal set, the special exposes all the elements that make the series this Fall's can't-miss drama.
In Sunday's all-new episode of QUANTICO ( Sunday, Oct. 11 at 10 p.m. ET /PT on CTV and CTV GO), entitled "Cover," Alex ( Priyanka Chopra ) finally receives information about her father and his FBI past. However, in the future, it's her mother, Sita ( Anna Khaja , SILICON VALLEY), who plays a key role when Liam ( Josh Hopkins ) convinces her to participate in a press conference on national television begging Alex to turn herself in. Also at Quantico, the NATS learn the art of profiling and focus on their classmates' strengths and weaknesses, ultimately challenging their confidence and comradery. QUANTICO airs Sundays at 10 p.m. ET /PT on CTV and CTV GO (visit CTV.ca to confirm local listings).
ETALK airs weeknights at 7 p.m. ET /PT on CTV and CTV GO, 7:30 p.m. ET /PT on CTV Two, and 6:30 p.m. ET on E! (visit CTV.ca to confirm local listings).

About CTV
CTV is Canada's #1 private broadcaster. Featuring a wide range of quality news, sports, information, and entertainment programming, CTV has been Canada's most-watched television network for the past 14 years in a row. CTV is a division of Bell Media, Canada's premier multimedia company with leading assets in television, radio, digital, and Out-of-Home. Bell Media is owned by BCE Inc. (TSX, NYSE: BCE), Canada's largest communications company. More information about CTV can be found on the network's website at CTV.ca .
